column1: transporting food by cars will cause global warming. so we should go local.
column2: we should try to convince our parents to stop using cars because it will cause global warming.
column3: some food, such as mongo, requires a warm weather to grow. so they have to be transported to canada.
column4: a typical electronic circuit can be built with a battery, a bulb, and a switch.
column5: electricity flows from batteries to the bulb, just like water flows through a tube.
column6: batteries have chemical energe in it. then electrons flow through a bulb to light it up.
column7: birds can fly because they have feathers and they are light.
column8: why can some birds like pigeons fly while some others like chickens cannot?
column9: feathers are important for birds to fly. if the feathers on a bird's wings are removed, this bird cannot fly.
